tables.name: accounting_balances
tables.description: This table provides a snapshot of account balances in the Cosmos ecosystem, including liquid and staking balances, as well as unclaimed and claimed rewards in various denominations. It offers a comprehensive view of account financials on the Cosmos blockchain.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the account balance was recorded.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the account balance was recorded.

columns.name: address
columns.description: The address of the account for which the balance was recorded.

columns.name: liquid_balance
columns.description: The liquid balance of the account in the native cryptocurrency.

columns.name: staking_balance
columns.description: The staking balance of the account in the native cryptocurrency.

columns.name: unclaimed_rewards
columns.description: The unclaimed rewards of the account in the native cryptocurrency.

columns.name: claimed_rewards
columns.description: The claimed rewards of the account in the native cryptocurrency.

columns.name: liquid_balance_usdc
columns.description: The liquid balance of the account in USDC, denominated in the native cryptocurrency.

columns.name: staking_balance_usdc
columns.description: The staking balance of the account in USDC, denominated in the native cryptocurrency.

columns.name: unclaimed_rewards_usdc
columns.description: The unclaimed rewards of the account in USDC, denominated in the native cryptocurrency.

columns.name: claimed_rewards_usdc
columns.description: The claimed rewards of the account in USDC, denominated in the native cryptocurrency.

tables.name: celestia_delagate
tables.description: This table provides a detailed overview of Cosmos blockchain transactions, covering various aspects of token transfers and validator actions. It offers insights into the dynamics of the Cosmos ecosystem.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction was processed.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was processed.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The public address of the account that initiated the transaction.

columns.name: validator
columns.description: The public address of the validator that processed the transaction.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens transferred or exchanged.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the tokens transferred or exchanged.

columns.name: new_shares
columns.description: The new amount of tokens held by the sender after the transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: celestia_undelagate
tables.description: This table provides an overview of transactions and actions within the Cosmos ecosystem, offering insights into the blockchain's activity and validation process. It includes key metrics such as block height, transaction hash, and token transfers.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction was recorded.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was created.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The account address that initiated the transaction.

columns.name: validator
columns.description: The validator that validated the transaction.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens transferred during the transaction.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the tokens transferred.

columns.name: completion_time
columns.description: The time it took for the transaction to be completed.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.
